500/650/700/1000ml Disposable Food Container-Thinwall and Transparent See Larger Photo Add to Basket Add to Product Favorites Trade Info
Payment Terms: T/T Trademark: Weida Packing: 300 Sets in Carton Standard: Q/320412wdj001-2004 Production Capacity: 900000 Ctns Per Months
Basic Info.
Usage: Packaging Type: Box Material: PP Virtue: Thin-Wall Advantages: Microwaveable and Frezzer Color: Transparent Techniques: Injection Export Markets: North America, South America, Southeast Asia, Africa, Mid East, Eastern Asia, Western Europe
Additional Info.
Trademark: Weida Packing: 300 Sets in Carton Standard: Q/320412wdj001-2004 Origin: Changzhou China Production Capacity: 900000 Ctns Per Months Company: Changzhou Runfu Hotel Supplies Co.Ltd.
Product Description
Plastic disposable food container/microwaveable takeaway box
Fireplace fuel is quite convenient and safe for keeping food, vegetables, fruit etc. Freshing, with the Runfu thin crisper, you can enjoy a more pleasead life.
Our manufactory possessing the advanced production equipments and technics with a strict quality control system. Higher efficiency and lower cost. Available in bulk or for retail applications to include appropriate packaging and merchandisers. Currently, this kind Of food crisper had been the most popular one in the international markets, it has the virtue of: A. Suitable for containing food B. High temperature resistant-as high as 110°C C. Low temperature resistant-as low as 10°C D. Recyclable E. Microwaveable F. Non-toxic G. Enviromentally friendly H. Punctual delivery I. Free Private Label J. Full range of fuel choices K. Sizes and specs customizable
Product uses For families to heat, refrigerate, and store various kinds of food, fruit; Store sundry articles of daily life, small toys, etc. For fast food restaurant to hold various types of meals For food manufacturers to hold various kinds of food.
Customize Service: We can Poduce according to the customer's requirements and free combination Share
